title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon. A dialog window will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Enter the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.

The observed behavior is that the Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but does not display the file extension.
EB: When performing the above steps, the expected behavior is that the Navigator should display the file extension for the saved file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon. A dialog window will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Enter the filename, but ignore the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.

Verify that the Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but does not display the file extension.
